page.title: 14Science and Technology.(1)
page.content: The waste products from Cynheidre Colliery form black slurry which is put into settling ponds.Chemicals are added to cleanse and purify it.The clean water is then pumped into the river.The slurry itself is then mixed with cement and tipped onto the spoil heap to prevent subsidence.7 bore holes have recently been sunk to find a site for a new pit. Cynheidre Colliery has 4 earthquake measuring machines in the area.Usually there are 18-20 earth tremors per day. When the number rises sharply it is a warning,to the workers,of an imminent blow out of methane gas underground. The washery at Cynheidre uses closed circuit television to monitor its processes.Number 2 winding engine operates through a mini computer.
